name: harmonycart
short_description: HarmonyCart is a cross-platform application used to program the Atari 2600 Harmony Cartridge through USB/SDHC card.  Both GUI and commandline usage is supported.
summary: USB programmer for the Atari 2600 Harmony Cartridge
